description: Looking for Toronto fishing charters? Fully guided fishing charters along Toronto's beautiful waterfront. Lake Ontario fishing charters are a great way to spend a day! Join us for some of the best salmon and trout fishing North America has to offer. Fish aboard our 33' tiara pursuit fishing matching one of the best rigged boats on Lake Ontario. Full washroom on board for upmost comfort.

reviews.title: Our freezer is full of salmon - what a morning!
text: This was the most rewarding fishing charter we have ever experienced. We have previously chartered in Haida G'waii and Vancouver.
My husband found Ryan's webpage online, and after some comparison shopping, he chose We Pound Em Sportsfishing. Ryan was easy to communicate with and gave us all the information we needed.

We chose the early morning (5 am) departure time, as the days were getting to 32C or more. Ryan was ready for us and we left promptly. He took us out around 4 miles from the marina, so we had a fantastic view of the sun coming up, igniting the downtown skyline in a firey red through the light fog.

By 10:30 am, we had caught 5 enormous chinook salmon (18 to 23lb each)  and 2 smaller coho. As Ryan began to clean our catch onboard, we were still catching more. It was incredible. The fish we caught amounted to around 80 lbs of cleaned fish.

The 38' Trojan diesel-powered vessel had a 14' wide beam, so we didn't feel crowded at all. Even while the two of us were fighting to land a huge king salmon at once, Ryan had ample room to work his nets between us. The private head in the cabin added to our comfort.
We would definitely recommend this business and will fish with Ryan again when our freezer is empty!

reviews.title: We had to buy a suitcase to transport salmon home.
text: Everything from start to finish was awesome. Ryan was quick getting back to us with a possible charter date, he answered all our questions and gave us all the info we needed to decide on whether to book or not.

We did an early morning charter and within 10 to 15 minutes of getting set up we were on fish. It was active early on with a lull a litttle later, too hot so we were slow in setting the hook. Then it went crazy and we fished hard until the end of the day. Ryan cleaned and bagged our catch, which amounted to 80+ lbs cleaned coho and pacific salmon.

Nice big boat running on diesel, no issues with fumes though. Ryan kept the boat nicely cleaned and organized during the charter and I liked the fact he gave a gaff to my wife to hold her catches for pics.
Great day, I'd definitely book again.

reviews.title: Amazing day of fishing
text: All 5 of us had a fantastic time out on the lake yesterday. Our guide Ryan did not dissappont, We all caught fish (Salmon and Rainbow trout). I can highly recommend this charter regardless of your level of fishing experience. I look forward to going again next year.

reviews.title: Salmontastic
text: To be straight to the point, Captain Ryan made the trip and I would recommend this to anyone and plan to return in the future.  The trip was a gift for my father and father-in-law and turned out to be a lifetime experience for them.  You literally do not have to have any fishing experience, Ryan takes care of everything!  You get to sit back and relax and then enjoy the fight when a fish bites on with Ryan there to guide you through it. We caught and kept TWO 21 pound King Salmon and a 10 pound Coho Salmon! Realistically it's fishing, he can't guarantee you are going to have a day like we did, but he will do everything he can to make that possible!

reviews.title: Amazing Fishing Experience!
text: One word:  FANTASTIC!  Ryan provided us with a magical day on Lake Ontario.  We were complete rookies, but he made us feel like professionals by the end of the day.  He was enthusiastic and answered all our questions with great insights.  The boat was clean and safe.  And best of all, we caught a lot of nice, big fish!  Moreover, Ryan gutted them for us, so we came home with beautiful fillets.  Simply a great experience that our family will talk about for a long time to come!

reviews.title: Highly Recommened
text: Ryan is a great guy with a deep love for fishing. He works very hard to keep his clients on the fish. Top notch boat and equipment and goes over and above to keep his customers happy! Thanks for the awesome day on the water Ryan!!

reviews.title: We pounded em
text: Ryan worked hard to put us on fish.  We came home with 3 Coho and released twice that many rainbow.   Can't tell you how many we lost.  He's a nice guy that knows what he's doing.  Beautiful 33 foot boat, with lots of dance floor to fight fish.   Nice view of Toronto skyline at sunrise.   Hope to make this trip again in the future.  Thanks again, Ryan.

reviews.title: Amazing Experience
text: An organization that should be attended by anyone interested in fishing. Thank you to the whole team. It is my advice to everyone.

reviews.title: Great Time & Went Above & Beyond
text: We had a great time and my 14year old son LOVED it! Ryan went above and beyond squeezing in our trip and getting our fish back home to Colorado. We've been on tons of charters and Ryan was amazing. He put out tons of lines, kept switching up bait, moving around, etc. to make sure we got as many fish as possible. Would definitely go again and would recommend.

reviews.title: Ryan was the best!!!
text: Our group of 6 had a great day out and caught a lot more fish than expected! I have absolutely no fishing experience and that is okay! Ryan does it all and best of all he even cleaned our many fish for us! I would highly recommend Ryan!

reviews.title: Another great time on Lake Ontario
text: Good friends, great fishing and Ryan did his usual superlative job!  Can’t wait for next time!  Thanks!

reviews.title: Awesome day fishing!
text: RYAN was friendly, professional and was able to put us on the salmon. We had double headers and even a triple. Great day out with friends caught a ton of fish he cleans them for you as well! Very clean boat and the best set up out there! Highly recommend

reviews.title: Most Awesome fishing ever!
text: Ryan Hare is an excellent captain and guide. He put us onto schools of trout and salmon making for my boys first charter absolutely spectacular
Highly recommended!
Dr. Oz

reviews.title: Amazing experience!!! Such a blast!
text: We had a group of 3 on the boat with Ryan. Fish on almost immediately after dropping the lines. We did a shorter trip because we had to catch a flight, but caught 20+ Chinook Salmon in 3 hours. We kept very busy!

Aside from the great success catching the fish, Ryan was an amazing guide. He was professional. He set everything up for us so we just had to reel in the fish. His boat was clean and well-maintained. He had very nice equipment, and clearly reinvests in his business.
After catching the fish, he cut them into filets for us and packaged them up so we could take them home.
We would definitely fish with Ryan again!

reviews.title: Great day, great fun, great fishing
text: I've been out with Ryan a few times and when our Tailored Living Franchisee meeting group asked for a memorable activity, We Pound 'Em immediately came to mind.
A great September day, low 20s, bright but a bit overcast (not on the water in full sun), calm water and great fishing.
Ryan quickly took us to the fish where we caught over a dozen salmons including two 18 lbs and Steelheads including one over 17 lbs. Plenty of action for 6 guys.
Overall, a great outing - Thanks Ryan!!

reviews.title: Great fishing !
text: Great day on " we pound em" ryan had us into triple headers within 5 minutes of fishing, action all day on a huge beautiful boat with all the newest fishing gear. Highly recommend this charter!!

reviews.title: Family fun!
text: We had such a great time with Ryan. He's professional and really knows his stuff! He's also very friendly and knowledgeable about the lake and surrounding lakes. He has history. The fish were great and played along. And ryan knew where to find them! He caught a few big ones and a few smaller ones. Ryan cleaned them all for us and involved my nephew(7) in everything to make sure he was busy. It's an early start but well worth the tour! Thanks Ryan!

reviews.title: Fishing charter
text: Ryan took our group of 5 out, we had an awesome time, we all caught salmon. Ryan is very professional, and has all the best equipment needed. Many thanks Ryan, we look forward to coming again.
Ron Poulin

reviews.title: Unbelievable experience
text: Ryan is a professional, easy to reach via email and text. Big safe boat, very clean, don't  be afraid of booking online, my customers loved it. see you next year
Ryan est très professionnel, facile à rejoindre par email ou texte. Gros bateau sécuritaire, très propre, soyez sans crainte pour la réservation en ligne, mes clients ont adorés. À l'année prochaine.

reviews.title: An Unbelievable Experience
text: Just an unbelievable experience...Catching salmon with the CN tower in the background. Ryan our captain and guide, was simply amazing....The only issue i have it to try and figure out when i can go back.....

reviews.title: pound them is right!
text: this was the best fishing trip I have ever taken. My family and I went out this summer and we pounded them all day. The guide is a great guy he’s  knowledgeable and friendly his boat is equipped with everything you need. Don’t waste your money with others go with this guy you’ll get your moneys worth and a great trip and a great experience and your pound him.

reviews.title: Eating Salmon all winter
text: This trip was purchased for a 60th birthday bucket list check-off.

So 6 friends (poker buddies) ventured to the Big 6 for a little adventure.  There were a few grumbles about having to raise up at 4 a.m. to be downtown Toronto for 6 but everyone survived the trip. (All had afternoon naps tho)
They were explained how things worked, most being fisherman already were aware. Out they went, bang a beauty. But then it died. Nothing else was caught.
So they were given another date, which was bad weathered out...but finally the trip began again. This time leaving at 5 a.m. (as the sun rises later), and off they go.

This time they SLAM back the salmon, even a non-sexed salmon which is apparently a rare fish. (but oh so delicious). They all ended up with plenty of fish on board and have now booked this adventure for next year.
The captain has entered them into the Salmon fishing derby (hoping to catch biggest of day and win some cash) .
Sadly, I think this has become yet another fishing adventure these crazy oldies will do every year. Sure the wives are thrilled tho!!

reviews.title: Great fishing trip
text: My family had a great time fishing with Ryan. He was a good captain and put us on fish throughout the trip. His boat and fishing tackle were in excellent shape and he provided good advice on how to land our fish. I plan to return when I return to visit Toronto.

reviews.title: Great fishing with a view
text: We've been fishing with Ryan on 15th August and the weather was good. The whole communication between Ryan and us was really good and without any problems. He was very kind and exact with the informations.

At the day we went fishing he already waited for us at the marina. After we arrived to our first fishing spot, we were trolling for about 20-30 minutes, until the first fush was on the line! All together we caught about 12 fishes and even lost some. We can totally recommend Ryan as your fishing guide! We would love to come back again! Thanks Ryan!

reviews.title: Excellent guide and fishing!
text: Ryan, thanks for the great experience.  In spite of the possibility of being stormed out, we had an awesome trip.  You were recommended by my neighbor and lived up to the hype.
Excellent job on the fish filets too!
Denis

reviews.title: Amazing Salmon Fishing
text: Our group of six had an amazing time on this fishing trip! We each caught up to two salmon weighing around 20lbs each!!! The boat was super spacious and the host, Ryan, was absolutly amazing, friendly and passionate! He even cleaned all the fish very skillfully and made sure the meat would taste delicious- and oh boy, it sure was!!!

reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
text: My brother, dad, cousin and uncle had an awesome trip this morning with Ryan. He's a consummate professional and clearly has a passion and knowledge of fishing. It's also clear he has an appreciation for our Great Lakes and the environment as a whole. Like many reviewers have mentioned, Ryan keeps his boat and gear in clean and excellent condition. We caught Coho, Chinook, and Steelhead early on and had a great time the rest of the morning. We hope to be back out again next year. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Fishing
text: Best fishing guide out there. From big to small all day. Great guy to talk to and knows wear the fish are.

reviews.title: Great fishing trip!
text: I do this trip with Ryan every year and it is always a fantastic time! Highly recommended! Ryan is a great captain with a clean boat and excellent gear. We've caught Coho, Chinook and Atlantic Salmon along with Rainbow Trout.

reviews.title: Awesome!
text: Ryan is a great fishing guide. He took us out on Lake Ontario for some Salmon fishing and it did not disappoint.
The fishing was great and Ryan made sure we had a great time.
10/10 would recommend.

reviews.title: What a Great Day!
text: The price alone was great for just a perfect day on a boat. But you get to catch a lot of fish too! Ryan was great to deal with. He put the lines out, knew when there was a fish on and was a great help all around. We (Ryan) caught 14 fish and lost 3. Cooler was full. Boat fit the six of us very comfortably. Views were great and it was just a perfect day of fishing out on the lake. We all had an amazing time. It was truly a great day that I will never forget.

reviews.title: Awesome time on the lake with Ryan
text: My 12 year old daughter loves to fish, and this was the ‘big’ thing that she wanted to do this summer.  I’m not an out-doorsy, sporty type of Mom, so I knew that I needed help in a big way.

I found We Pound Em Fishing through a google search.  The website indicated that they supply all of the fishing gear and equipment, and would be there to help with instruction if needed.  All this, and it was located in Toronto, at the Scarborough Bluffs.  This was perfect for us.

Our guide was Ryan, and he was great!  He showed us the equipment and described how it worked, showing us what to look for on the sonar.  When the fish started biting, Ryan jumped into gear and got my daughter in position and ready.  He guided her throughout each step in the process, providing good feedback to help improve her form and technique.
My daughter caught four 15 to 18 pound salmon, and a smaller one that she named Tiny.  Ryan cleaned, cut, and packaged the salmon for us - which we will be enjoying for months and months.  😊

For me, it was a great day too.  It was wonderful being out in the water on such a warm summer day.  We were out for about 5 hours.  The city and sunset views were spectacular.  But the best for me was watching the excitement in my daughter as she caught and reeled in her first big catch.  Nothing could ever beat that!
Thanks again Ryan - we had an awesome time!

reviews.title: It was awesome
text: Had a excellent time highly recommend it! We will most certainly be going out again . Had a blast it was very well done!

reviews.title: a great time
text: had the time of my life its a great experience the fishing was good the guide was awesome definitely recommend going i know i will be going back next year

reviews.title: Sammon Fishing Trip
text: Went out with some family and friends and had a great experience. Our guide was friendly and so knowledgeable about the area, boat and fishing! Would definitely recommend to others. We plan to make this a yearly trip! I

reviews.title: Great time on the water!
text: My son and I had an excellent trip with Ryan.  Not only did we have a great time fishing, but Ryan took the time to share his wisdom.  We thoroughly enjoyed it. If you are looking for a fishing charter, Ryan is your guy!  Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Great family memories
text: We booked an afternoon trip for the family to see Lake Ontario and catch fish, and it didn't disappoint.  Ryan, the boat's owner/operator, was great.  We enjoy learning about the places we visit, and Ryan was a font of information about the lake, the fish, Toronto, Ontario, and Canada.  He did all that while never missing a strike.  The guy was a pro.  The family had a great time and I would highly recommend it if you're visiting Toronto.

reviews.title: Great Outing
text: Booked a fishing trip with Ryan of We Pound Em for myself and a few friends from work and Ryan did not disappoint. He put us on the fish right away. Ryan is very knowledgeable and walked us through the process of landing some big salmon and steelhead. Thanks again Ryan for a great time, we are definitely going to book with you again.

reviews.title: Great Trip with good results
text: Took my grandsons fishing on Lake Ontario, we had a great time with Ryan and brought back some nice salmon and steelhead. Will use again on our next trip.

reviews.title: fantastic!
text: Early bird gets the worm. 530am on the water..fish on within 15 minutes.
Ryan made us feel welcome, took care of everything and made the day very enjoyable.  16 fish on the lines and 11 landed, all keepers. money well spent!
